charts.title: The 20-Minute Meeting: A Step-by-Step Guide
charts.value: This process flow diagram visually outlines the steps of the 20-minute meeting, making the suggested framework easy to understand and follow.  It clarifies the process described in the text, enhancing comprehension and actionability.

data.label: Review and Clarification (Minutes 0-5)
data.description: Review proposed changes; address questions and concerns.

data.label: Impact Assessment (Minutes 5-10)
data.description: Discuss impact on timeline and budget; use visual aids to illustrate adjustments.

data.label: Agreement and Documentation (Minutes 10-15)
data.description: Agree on changes; document decisions meticulously including cost and schedule impact.

data.label: Next Steps and Assignments (Minutes 15-20)
data.description: Assign responsibilities; define next steps and deadlines.  Confirm everyone understands their role and timelines.
